Brightcove Customer Support Feedback
WE ARE CLOSING YOUR CASE
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
This is a follow-up email in regards to your recent live event support request and your experience working with {!Case.OwnerFirstName}. Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber} Subject: {!Case.Subject}
If you have a moment, we would really appreciate your feedback. On a scale of 1 to 5, with 5 being very satisfied and 1 being very dissatisfied how would you rate this case?
https://www.getfeedback.com/r/h7vb8XI1?Case_Contact_ID={!Case.ContactId}&Case_ID={!Case.Id}&Case_Account_ID={!Case.AccountId}&Case_Contact={!Case.Contact}&Case_Account={!Case.Account}&Case_Owner_Full_Name={!Case.OwnerFullName}&Case_Case_Number={!Case.CaseNumber}&Case_Closed_Date={!Case.ClosedDate}&Case_Support_Package={!Case.Support_Package__c}&Case_Origin={!Case.Origin}&Contact_Email={!Contact.Email}&Case_Account_Tier={!Case.Account_Tier__c}&Case_Account_Edition={!Case.Account_Edition__c}&Case_Survey_Number={!Case.Survey_Number__c}&gf_id={!Contact.Email}{!Case.Id}&gf_unique={!Contact.Email}{!Case.Id}
If you require further assistance and/or information regarding this specific case, please reply directly to this email so we may provide additional support. If we do not hear back from you we will consider the case resolved.
Warm regards, The Brightcove Customer Support Team
You can see all of your cases in our Support Portal, and the current system status is always available on our Status Page.
